channel.title: ::setcase

item.title: ::setcase
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

i have this setcase command in my client.java

else if (command.startsWith("setcase")) { int case2 = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8)); println_debug("Packet: "+case2); packetType = case2; parseIncomingPackets(); }

and i dont know how to use it. i really would like to use a command to just type ::setcase blah and have a door work. i hope thats what this command is supposed to do? anyone know how to use it? or anything i need to add?

Read full topic
